name: Collage
description: An investigation of historical and contemporary art incorporating collage as a central methodology. The evolution of collage as a means of expression is explored through studio-based projects and lectures.
division: John H. Daniels Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, & Design
department: John H. Daniels Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, & Design
prerequisites: 0.5 FCE at the 200-level in VIS courses, JAV200H1/VIS200H1
